quote: If I can survive in 2007 and 2008 going forward in real estate, I am going to be positioned perfectly to survive when times are good.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of resilience and viewing challenges as opportunities.
suggested_hook: Why starting in a tough market can be your biggest advantage.

quote: Commitment is key. The more transactions I had, the less time I spent at the bar.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the direct impact of commitment on success.
suggested_hook: How commitment can transform your real estate career.
